projects.title: Go To Market Bot
projects.bodyText:
-This project problem statement is to help Ecommerce Merchandiser manage the products and maintain transparency with the admin.
 - Built an application using .NET framework.
 -Followed the layered approach <Data | Business Logic | UI> with emphasis on edge cases and exception handled.
 -Designed to identify valuable information in conversations using Microsoft LUIS ML. Model.
 -Uses Microsoft Flow to send OTP to the merchandiser and authenticate there access.

projects.title: HUNGER FREE SOCIETY
projects.bodyText:
- This project problem statement is solving the issue of Hunger, by making process of donating easier
 -Django based Telegram Bot coded in Python
.- It uses Waterfall Dialog to guide and ensure good user experience
 -It is hosted on heroku over Telegram Application.

projects.title: WEATHR BOT | NLP ENABLED
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: Github
projects.bodyText: - There are more projects to come! Please check out my Github for more projects!
